title: Web App
description: I'm proud to announce that In The Clear now has a web app! It has all the features of the iOS app, and best of all, it's at no extra cost. Head on over to https://app.intheclearapp.com to check it out!
To go along with the new web app, we have a new authentication page. This will allow you to get an ad-free experience on the web app, and more soon to be released features!
I also squashed just enough bugs for me to list "bug fixes" in the release notes.

title: iOS 13 Support
description: Support for Dark Mode in iOS 13 was added. If you have iOS 13.0+, you will definetly want this update!

title: Trip Stops
description: You are now able to select the places you are planning on stopping at, and select a time in which you plan on leaving.
Redesign of the trip time and distance label so it not only looks better, but also tells you more information.
I also fixed some design issues that caused the app to render awkwardly on the iPhone SE.
